about.title: About
about.description: EZDP is an enterprise-level deployment platform that provides comprehensive DevOps solutions including project configuration management, artifact deployment, notification management, and more. Built on Go + Vue 3 technology stack with support for multi-business line isolation, permission management, and other enterprise features.

projectManagement.title: Project Configuration Management
projectManagement.desc: Support for project creation, editing, querying, and deletion, including deployment environment configuration and code branch management.

packageDeploy.title: Artifact Deployment Management
packageDeploy.desc: Provides build and release functionality, supports major version release workflows, with WebSocket real-time notifications.

deployTools.title: Deployment Tools
deployTools.desc: Integrated deployment tools supporting automated deployment processes for frontend and backend projects.

notification.title: Notification Management
notification.desc: Real-time notification system with WebSocket push, read/unread marking, and notification list management.

userManagement.title: User & Permission Management
userManagement.desc: Comprehensive user management system including role-based access control and business line administrator configuration.

businessLine.title: Multi-Business Line Isolation
businessLine.desc: Support for multi-business line data isolation. Super admins can view across business lines, while regular users can only access their assigned business line data.
